Line11.137C58: If this is what the Zakarum stand for, we want no part of it.
Line15.137C1D: For turning away from the Zakarum, you've sentenced your entire family.
Line17.137C58: You leave me no choice then. I won't let you hurt them!
Line3.1343B7: I could have sworn I saw someone go in here...
Line5.137C58: Hurry, children. Try to keep quiet. It'll be all right.
Line7.137C1D: We know you're in here, Batzorig. How does it feel, knowing your brethren suffered to hide you in sin?
VoiceDir15.137C1D: Threatening. Almost amused; punishing people is part of his job, and he enjoys it.
VoiceDir17.137C58: Slowly realizing what must be done, preparing to defend his family to the death.
VoiceDir23.1343B7: Confused and a little concerned. He's feeling a spirit pass into his body but isn't sure what's happening. Struggling, then crying out in agony. This guy actively becoming possessed by a restless spirit.
VoiceDir3.1343B7: Confused. Slightly worried he took a wrong turn somewhere
VoiceDir5.137C58: Hurried while trying to calm his children; this father has brought his children here to hide them
